response.job_title: Technology | Fullstack Developer | React | Angular | NodeJS | Express | SQL | Linux | AWS | TI
response.summary: I am a systems and computer engineer, with experience as a fullstack developer of academic, geospatial and banking information systems, web and mobile applications, Linux server administration, using development tools such as Javascript, TypeScript, Angular, React, NodeJS, ExpressJS, PHP, TYPO3 CMS, SQL, MySql, Postgress, Mongo DB, Linux, Firebase, AWS, REST API, Python and Java. I have a high learning capacity, which allows me to acquire new knowledge applicable to the realization of high-value solutions to business models. English level B1.
response.skills: Stencil.js, Stancil, Terraform, MicroFrontEnds, Componentes web, Tecnología, Desarrollo Full Stack, React.js, Angular, Node.js, Express.js, SQL, Firebase, Amazon Web Services (AWS), TI, Hojas de estilos en cascada (CSS), HTML, Desarrollo de páginas web (Back-End), Desarrollo front end, Investigación

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:

- Analyze, design and develop websites for the National University of Colombia in order to strengthen communication and institutional image.
- Develop Full Stack web applications with TYPO3 CMS in LAMP environments
(Linux, Apache, MariaDB and PHP) to create solutions to the needs of the university.
- Develop mobile applications with the Flutter framework that allow easy access to institutional information.
- Manage the official accounts of mobile applications in the app store and play store that promote the web presence of the different products developed.

Achievements:

- I developed with Linux, Apache, MariaDB, PHP and Flutter the new mobile application for radio transmission of the University which I published in the play store and app store, complying 100% with the established times.
- Deployed the backend developed to 100% in production.
- I complied with the development of 100% of the functionalities in the time established for the realization of each proposed application, following the guidelines of the digital media office of Unimedios
profile_positions.title: Software engineer

profile_positions.description:
Responsabilidades:

-   Analizar y diseñar el nuevo sitio web para la empresa estadounidense Master Gutters.
-   Desarrollar la aplicación web con ReactJS.
-   Desplegar el software en el servicio hosting de Firebase con el dominio https://masterguttersusa.com/

Logros:

-	Cumplí con el 100% del desarrollo de la aplicación antes del tiempo acordado con el cliente
-	Mejoré la atracción de nuevos clientes de la empresa en un 20% al ser reconocida y posicionada por en indexador de Google.
-	Aumenté los canales de comunicación entre la empresa y el cliente en un 50% al agregar funcionalidades como comunicación vía whatsapp, enlaces a redes sociales y posicionamiento en Google search
profile_positions.title: Software Developer

profile_positions.description:
Responsabilidades:

-   Formar programadores en el Ciclo IV del programa MisionTIC del Ministerio de Telecomunicaciones de Colombia.
-   Enseñar los fundamentos del desarrollo de aplicaciones móviles para Android.
-   Instruir a los estudiantes en el uso de Android Studio y Kotlin
-   Supervisar el cumplimiento de tareas y talleres.

Logros:

- Desarrollé un prototipo de tienda virtual al 80% de similitud de una implementación real y puesta en producción.	
- Fuí seleccionado como Jurado en la Hackaton de misión TIC 2021.
-Cumplí con el 100% del temario del curso en donde más del 80% de estudiantes demostraron haber adquirido habilidades para el desarrollo de aplicación móviles en Kotlin y Android.
profile_positions.title: Android developer trainer

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:

- Analyze and design a multiplatform mobile application that offers a complete guide to oral hygiene for dentistry patients.
- Develop a mobile application with the IONIC, Angular, Typescript, Html and css tools that allow a pleasant interaction between the patient and his dentist.
- Apply Firebase services that allow the storage of data and the sending of push notifications in order to remind patients of the best oral hygiene practices.

Achievements:

- I 100% implemented the functionalities agreed with the client, following the guidelines of professional dentists.
- I increased the communication channels between the patient and their dentist by 80%, using the link via whatsapp and push notifications.
profile_positions.title: Software developer

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:

- Analyze, design and develop websites for the National University
from Colombia.
- Develop Full Stack web applications with TYPO3 CMS in LAMP environments
(Linux, Apache, MariaDB and PHP)
-Develop mobile applications with the Flutter framework
- Manage official accounts of mobile applications in app store and play store

Achievements:

- Developed 5 web and mobile applications that strengthened the communication tools and institutional image of UNAL
- I published 5 mobile applications in the official accounts of the play store and app store of the UNAL.
- I complied with the development of 100% of the functionalities in the time established for the realization of each proposed application, following the guidelines of the digital media office of Unimedios
profile_positions.title: Software engineer

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:

- Design and develop information systems that allow documentary management for the exploration of oil wells of the company Ecopetrol.
- Provide support in the elaboration of IT solutions. applied to Geographic Information Systems (GIS) that show clearly and precisely on geospatial maps.
- Develop full stack web applications with Angular, Typescript, html, css, Oracle and .Net that keep the information persistent and accessible by the areas in charge of Ecopetrol.

Achievements:
- Developed 70% of the functionalities at the Front-end level, in a system with more than 80 relational tables in the database.
- Achieved 100% integration between a documentary information system and the Argis information system.
profile_positions.title: System Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Rresponsibilities:
-Create an information system that calculates indicators for the accreditation process
International ABET of Electrical and Electronic Engineering undergraduate programs.
-Design and develop a FullStack system in Angular, Html, Css and Express.Js for the management
of the proposed system.
-Design and implement a relational database in MySql that organizes the qualifications of
students and relationships with ABET indicators.

Achievements:
- Visualize 90% of the information of a MySQL database in developed graphs
with Angular and TypeScript.
- I met 100% of the requirements agreed with the Engineering department
Electrical and Electronics from UNAL
profile_positions.title: Student assistant - Software Developer

profile_positions.description:

- Manage the web server of the Faculty of Sciences of the National University of Colombia.
- Manage services hosted in LAMP environments (Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP).
- Support the activities of the teacher contests called by the dean's office of the Faculty of Sciences.
- Create websites on the CMS TYPO3 platform with HTML, CSS, Javascript, PHP and manage their content.

- Support intervention project executed by the University.
- Support the project management in the control of information.

company.name: Fiduciaria de Occidente S.A.
company.description:
Somos una de las empresas más reconocidas en el sector fiduciario; desde 1991 y gracias a la tenacidad de un equipo innovador y comprometido, hemos consolidado la confianza de nuestros clientes e inversionistas a través de productos y servicios fiduciarios que satisfacen sus necesidades. 

Día a día nuestro talento humano trabaja con disciplina, responsabilidad, respeto, cooperación, compromiso y transparencia para lograr en conjunto nuestro posicionamiento en el mercado, garantizando el crecimiento, la utilidad esperada por los accionistas y el bienestar de nuestros funcionarios. 

Como miembro del Grupo Aval y filial del Banco de Occidente, Fiduoccidente brinda un espacio de aprendizaje en mejores prácticas del mercado y de proyección profesional en busca de la construcción de metas
